scripts.seed:delete-all: node seeders/review.Seeder.js -d && node seeders/product.Seeder.js -d && node seeders/category.Seeder.js -d
scripts.seed:all: node seeders/admin.Seeder.js && node seeders/restaurant.Seeder.js && node seeders/category.Seeder.js && node seeders/product.Seeder.js && node seeders/review.Seeder.js
scripts.seed:reset: node seeders/review.Seeder.js -d && node seeders/product.Seeder.js -d && node seeders/category.Seeder.js -d && node seeders/admin.Seeder.js && node seeders/restaurant.Seeder.js && node seeders/category.Seeder.js && node seeders/product.Seeder.js && node seeders/review.Seeder.js
scripts.seed:full-reset: node seeders/resetAll.Seeder.js && node seeders/admin.Seeder.js && node seeders/restaurant.Seeder.js && node seeders/category.Seeder.js && node seeders/product.Seeder.js && node seeders/review.Seeder.js
